articles.description: Unlock the secrets of Forbidden Temple (Fire & Ice), score elemental Rocket Pass Items, and unleash the new Emperor car in Season 9.
articles.content:
Hot Like Fire, Cool Like Ice
Long held in place by an ancient seal, the dragons of Forbidden Temple Arena have finally awoken from their slumber. As the two resume their eternal battle, these legend… [+3616 chars]
